did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle:
Roscoe R. Bell Materia Medica notebook,
n.d.

persname.normal: [give the MARC presentation of creator here, i.e., surname first; include dates]

did.repository: Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: One bound notebook of mimeographed notes on veterinary materia medica. It is unclear if the book was written by, or simply owned by Roscoe R. Bell.

bioghist.head: BIOGRAPHICAL NOTE
bioghist.p:
Roscoe Rutherford Bell published two veterinary texts:
The veterinarian's call book ... A visiting list which can be commenced at any time and used until full, containing much useful information for the student and busy practitioner. (New York: Sabiston & Murray, 1893) and Pocket remembrancer for the veterinary student and busy practitioner(New York: William R. Jenkins Co., 1912). There is no other information currently available about him.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: One bound notebook of mimeographed notes on veterinary materia medica written by Roscoe R. Bell.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: Roscoe R. Bell Materia Medica notebook, #6606. Division of Rare and Manuscript Collections, Cornell University Library.
